titleStmt.title: A discourse of foreign war with an account of all the taxations upon this kingdom, from the conquest to the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth : also, a list of the confederates from Henry I to the end of the reign of the said queen ... / formerly written by Sir Robert Cotton, Barronet, and now published by Sir John Cotton, Barronet.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.

notesStmt.note: The translation of "The French charity" is sometimes ascribed to John Evelyn.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
"A short view of the long reign of King Henry III": p. 103-129.
Imperfect: "A short view of the long reign of King Henry III" and "The French charity" are lacking on film.
